trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> class uses classes derived from DiscoveryEndpointProvider to get the discovery endpoint to use.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>클래스 DiscoveryEndpointProvider에서 파생 된 클래스를 사용 하 여 사용할 검색 끝점을 가져옵니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider"></xref> class.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> class calls the GetDiscoveryEndpoint method on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> instance passed by the user to get the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> for discovering the services.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>GetDiscoveryEndpoint 메서드를 호출 하는 클래스는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider>인스턴스를 가져올 사용자로 전달 된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint>서비스를 검색 하기 위한.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> also calls GetDiscoveryEndpoint method whenever it must clone itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>또한 자체 복제 해야 할 때마다 GetDiscoveryEndpoint 메서드를 호출 합니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>
